lessons.title: What is AI?  (It's like a super-smart puppy!)
Teaching AI: Machine Learning Basics (Training your puppy with treats!)
Data is King! (Puppy's favorite toys - the data AI learns from)
Supervised Learning: Teaching with examples (Showing your puppy what's a 'good boy'!)
Unsupervised Learning: Puppy plays and figures things out itself!
Reinforcement Learning: Rewards and punishments (Treats for good behavior!)
Building your first AI model (Coding a simple puppy predictor!)
Python for AI: The best treats for your AI puppy!
Libraries and Frameworks: Your puppy's favorite toys (NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn)
Neural Networks: Your puppy's brain (a simplified explanation)
Deep Learning: A really smart puppy!
Generative AI:  Creating new things (Puppy painting!)
Large Language Models (LLMs): Puppy understands human language!
Working with LLMs:  Talking to your AI puppy!
Prompt Engineering:  Talking to your puppy clearly!
Vector Databases: Organizing your puppy's toys (efficiently!)
Semantic Search: Finding the right toy for your puppy!
Agentic AI: Your puppy learns to make decisions (on its own!)
Building an AI Agent:  Giving your puppy tasks!
The Future of AI (Where will your super-smart puppy go next?)
